title: How to Change Your Delivery Date & Time on Amazon

steps.title: Contact Amazon support using their Live Chat option.
steps.content: Contact Amazon support using their Live Chat option. Give them your order number, and answer any additional questions they ask.

steps.title: Politely ask the support agent if you can change the delivery date to a time that suits you.
steps.content: Politely ask the support agent if you can change the delivery date to a time that suits you.

steps.title: Check your parcel via.
steps.content: Check your parcel via. the tracking options on the order to make sure that the new date has been set.
